reviews.review: Great game I shat myself when valve guy turned around tho
i love this game and have played it more on another account its the best game ever and i suggest getting this game and the one before this one too
very fun, i played on co-op with a friend and now i wish i could do that again
my friend and i yell at each other, the friendship strengthened, recommended
I can feel my brain expanding out of the holes i poked in my skull
The game is awesome, the storyline, I have never played a game with more storyline, I love this game and most definitely recommend it. [I almost want to play again, maybe I will!]

Alright, completed this game Co-op With my friend, and now we consider ourselves the most intelligent persons alive.
no kidding one of the best co-op game, hardly get bored cuz you always have to keep using your brain, overall we need part 3 XD (like hell they are gonna give us that)
Absolutely amazing game. The puzzles, story, humor, and characters are so intricate, detailed and polished, I started caring more about GLaDOS than any other game character I've seen.
yes very good i like the blue ball person
This game is still great in 2021 and i like it.

Story? Check
Great puzzles? Check
Fun multiplayer? Check

One of Valves staple products, this game lives up to the hype and still holds up great in 2021.
My only issue is that I with they'd make another one already. Portal puzzles force you to use your brain in ways almost no other game does, while also introducing you to an interesting world and story. 10/10
Probably the best puzzle game ever made. it's so much fun starting with the story in single-player and then moving on to co-op with a friend. i also recommend checking out the community made levels.
Muy buen juego, es muy entretenido por el sistema de puzzles y descrubrir la historia que nos brinda el anterior juego.

super good game the mod selection is spectacular this was the last gift that my grandma gave me before she passed from stage 3 cancer, makes me cry.

Joguinho de puzzle kk

This game has nice and satisfying puzzle levels, strange cast of characters and ok textures. Pretty outdated actually. Still worth playing if you are into puzzles. You can also make your own test chambers. (puzzle room) The reason for the chamber maker being sort of bad is because of the long rendering time it takes to set up lightning and the level itself. People had like 2 core computers back when the game was released so I bet it took lots of time to just test and modify your own levels. And just like the name is hinting to, Portal 2 is 2 player!
Infinite physics puzzles because it has a make your own map mode and community made maps. Also, the campaign is much longer than the first portal.
A must play physics-based puzzle game that everyone should know.
this is one of my favortie games

One of my most favorite games i've ever played. It has a very nice story line, the puzzles are mind bending, and the game overall is very polished. Very enjoyable screaming at my sister while playing this on an Xbox 360. Played through this game more than once. If this isn't in your library, you are insane.
this is a very fun game im glad i bought it even in times like now i very fun using portals 10 out of 10 would play again (witch i have)
like it but it keeps crashing :(
Es como el primero, una maravilla.

This game is art. That's all I have to say, honestly
This happened to my buddy Eric once.

It's been a long time since I played a game like this , which forced me to think a lot and even had an attractive story !
Actually it was a great game and I wish somebody erase my mind so I can play it again

love the characters and dialogue. much comedy.
10/10
It's portal, you know what it is. It's cool.
